title: How to locate someone on a cell phone - Quora

response.answer_text: By far the simplest way Phone them and say ‘where are you?’. Wait for a response. The easy-ish way Ask them to install a location sharing app, and add you to the list of people they share location with The variable way Use their social media accounts and monitor for check-ins, or shared images that show location. The hard way Get a court order for their mobile data. Use the court order with the carrier to determine the towers they are connecting to. Use the towers to work out the approximate location. Use a local search teams to locate the person.
